original_text: But the Lord says, ‘ Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.’ But the Lord says, ‘ Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.’ But the Lord says, ‘ Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.’ But the Lord says, ‘ Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.’ But the Lord says, ‘ Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.’ But the Lord says, ‘ Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시되 악인에게는 평강이 없다 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: 'Wicked people will have no peace in their lives.'
sentences.korean_translation: 악인들은 그들의 삶에서 평화를 누리지 못할 것이다.'
